name: Atlas: Legend of the Dice Roller
name_original: Atlas: Legend of the Dice Roller
description:
Atlas: Legend of the Dice Roller. Roll the dice to decide your fate in the world. Available in English and Japanese (日本語).

We made the game for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam, where participants were challenged to make a game within 48 hours. 

Credits: Made by Atlas team, a group of 6 international developers, sound designers and a translator. Main menu by sam-cox, English to Japanese translation by Siro, Music by brunexner, and main coding by Callum, dendimaniac and greengrass17.

Assets used: 

https://secrethideout.itch.io/rogue-dungeon-tileset-16x16

https://getsoundly.com/ Royalty-free sounds.
